short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds features to xkcd.com: arrow key navigation, R for random, title text inline

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds features to xkcd.com for a smoother browsing experience:

- Use left/right arrow keys for navigation (hold shift/cmd/ctrl to go to first/last)
- Press R for a random comic
- Title text displayed directly below comic
